DECLARE @reportDate DATE DECLARE @workspaceName VARCHAR(55) DECLARE @monitorName VARCHAR(55)
SET @reportDate='{reportdate}' SET @workspaceName='{workspace}' SET @monitorName='{monitor}'
SELECT [RiskGroup] ,[LiquidationValue] ,[NettedScenarioRisk] ,[GroupRisk] FROM [BradySPANMarketData] WHERE SPANId=( SELECT r.SPANId FROM BradySPANReportHeader r WHERE r.ReportDate=@reportDate AND r.Workspace=@workspaceName AND r.FormName=@monitorName ) ORDER BY RiskGroup
